product_name: Salomon Pearl Boa Snowboard Boots - Women's - 2012/2013
long_description: The Salomon Pearl Boa snowboard boots go on easy and offer a fast, secure and easy-to-use Boa(R) lacing sytem for a perfect fit. Boa(R) Coiler lacing system, with ankle and cable guides along entire edge of eyestays, distributes closure force evenly for a dialed-in fit that won't loosen up. The Coiler scoops up loose cable when entering as well as exiting the boot; put your foot in, pull back on the tongue, twist the reel a few times and you're off. Thermal-formable Feel Good liners conform to feet after several days of riding, and are crafted with a wide range of foams to fit specific flex zones on feet and ankles. Preshaped footbeds provide foot stabilization and arch support for improved pressure distribution; antimicrobial finish helps keep odors at bay. Liner lacing system is a quick, 1-pull tightener that won't burn your fingers; it provides a supportive, personalized fit with natural flex and feel. Salomon Pearl Boa boots with stomp outsoles protect you on bomb drops and unexpected cement landings; plus, they offer good board feel and response.
short_description: The Salomon Pearl Boa snowboard boots go on easy and offer a fast, secure and easy-to-use Boa(R) lacing sytem for a perfect fit.
